reviews.review: 三年的更新，现在的游戏是最难上手的版本，但也是内容最为丰富的版本。主线剧情刚刚展开，得分项相较两年前更多，一眼看过去都挺友好的……努力往高段位爬吧 ，能打进黄绿段就可以开始佛系了，队友都懂得互相照顾。一个人太寂寞就拉个朋友组车队，只要不和孤儿较真，什么都好说。就是回档BUG比较劝退……（zzz：我们在修了）
Jogo quase perfeito, muito bom tanto na jogabilidade quanto nos graficos e interações, perfeito para quem quer aprender a brincar de pique esconde ou gostaria de se tornar um assasino em série.
Гыыы

So, there's this person chasing you.  The tension is on.  The hooks are in, or NOT.   Preferably not.   There are three peeps with you, they might be running in circles but that's okay.   There are generators you gotta smash and grab, in a fashion that there is no smashing but instead fixing.   Also no grabbing.   There are some big doors, and also a lil door, but either is fine.  You open them, and zip zop boobley bop, you're outta there.    But then you're in there again.  And again.  And again.
big jae me

В данной игре решает все слаженная командная игра, намного интереснее играть с друзьями. Графон не самый лучший, но он в этой игре и не должен стоять на первом месте, есть и некоторые косметические баги, которые нужно решать, а не выпускать новых донатных персов, карты очень схожи по структуре. Разработчикам необходимо позаботится о картах, а не о выпусках персонажей, которых можно купить игроку.
Ну и нужно сказать о многочисленных ошибок по типу: не удалось обновить ваш ранг, нет подключения к интернету. Ужасные серверы, у меня с интернетом все хорошо, но все равно вылетает на главный фон,где нужно нажимать пробел.... Редко, но бывает,что игра крашится в самые не подходящие моменты
Но я пока в это играю, но не уверен, что затянет меня на несколько сотен часов

Good game

Honestly, while it's a buggy mess, DBD is one of the games I've had the most fun in. If you can ignore some of the more toxic members of the community and don't tryhard too much it's a blast. From silly shenanigans such as having a head shaking war with a killer where they keep telling you "no" but you know the best answer is "yes" or having a conga line of survivors, to the thrill of escaping or actually manage to track and capture your prey after an intense chase the game has fun whether you're serious or not. Sure it's a buggy mess but it's a lovable buggy mess that's well worth the cost though, I'd strongly recommend getting it cheap and ignoring the dlcs until you know you enjoy it. Give it about 3 games. 2 to get the hang of things and 1 to enjoy.

Edit: I really don't have much to add outside of the fact that the devs are clearly trying their best to make this game better with each update. They're surprisingly willing to recognize their mistakes most of the time and it's in a much healthier state than it used to be.

Amo Dbd, tem uns bugs as vezes, mas depois de um tempo o pessoal arruma, o que eu não curto muito no Jogo são alguns players que são muito tóxicos, reclamam demais, se você consegue ignorar bora jogar por que é muito divertido, ah e se você for muito competitivo também vai complicar porque não tem como survival e Killer ganhar ou vai ser um ou outro, alguém sempre acaba decepcionado.

2.5小时,护士小姐姐追我的时候，吓得大叫一声。目前还是个恐怖游戏。
7小时，基本熟练修理发电机，偶尔也能陪屠夫跑跑路。

降价特别良心，我是以前入手了所有dlc的（大部分全价），心疼自己。游戏对萌新可能不太友好，但是我相信你肯定会遇到很多照顾萌新的屠夫（游戏本就是非对抗性的，可能有些屠夫不会手下留情，但那也本就是游戏规则之内的），希望你玩这个游戏有一个良好的心态，能够遇到一群可爱的人（游戏单排可能会有恐怖感，但是多排是很欢乐的），希望黎明杀机能够在你的青春中留下浓墨重彩的一笔，希望你、希望我们也能够一直陪伴着黎明杀机。
this game is legendary, i bought a whole new computer just to be able to play this game again
i loved this game
希望可以有多点屠夫，出个杰森也许不错。

农场开局，来者走地鸡，4个LT无敌窗连成一片，我大臂一挥，此地遛狗，绝对五台，信心满满，等待最后一台，但可惜天不遂人愿，刚第一台，无敌窗踩夹，一刀下落，一波带走 ，上演直播开饭。
这一局，十五分钟，玩的是手脚发颤，最后一台电机不开，更让我痛心疾首，想我老谋深算，一时不慎，让人类节奏就此毁于一旦。
此时，突然间我醒悟过来，自责不已 ，试想，一千八百小时的光阴如果我用在读书也许早已考上清华北大走上人生繁华 ，如果用在务农种地，也许早已丰收在即，金黄满地，喜笑颜开，如果用在强身健体也许早已身强体壮，力大无比，轻松 拿走奥运金牌 ，而我却在这鼠标与键盘中，浪费人生 ，任由大好的青春泼洒在这虚幻之间。
我哈哈一笑，就此醒悟也不算太晚 ，于是我拿起鼠标， 重重一摔，桌子微颤，狠狠的点击了
再来一局。

Игра вполне себе интересная, хоть и может наскучить некоторым уже после 300 часов. У игры свои фичи и баги, но разрабы продолжают работать над игрой. Хоть многие игру обсирают, все же они продолжают играть в эту прелесть :D Разрабы конечно стараются, но иногда совсем в ненужную сторону. 7 хитов через паллету из 10

Meu avô fumou a vida inteira. Eu tinha uns 6 anos quando ouvi minha mãe dizer a ele: ''Se você quiser ver seus netos se formando, você tem que parar imediatamente''. Nunca tinha visto meu avô chorar antes, ele percebeu o quanto tinha a perder se continuasse a fumar. Ele jogou o cigarro que estava fumando no chão e falou que nunca mais ia fumar e se esforçou muito pra cumprir essa promessa, infelizmente, três anos depois ele morreu de câncer de pulmão. Foi muito triste e realmente me destruiu por dentro. A minha mãe desde então ficou me dizendo: ''Nunca fume. Por favor não deixe sua família passar pela mesma tristeza que seu avô nôs fez passar''. Eu concordei e prometi a mim mesmo nunca fumar. Aos 19 anos, mesmo após muitas tentações, nunca toquei num cigarro. Devo admitir que me arrependo profundamente disso, porque este jogo me deu câncer de qualquer jeito..

优秀的恐怖逃生游戏，无论是当屠夫砍人处决，还是当逃生者逃脱杀手的追逐都非常刺激。
17年开始接触的这款游戏，玩了超过1300多小时。主玩人类。这款游戏最好玩的地方就在于随着技术的提升人屠和屠人对抗的博弈。当然，和朋友一起开黑更有趣欢乐。新出的死亡枪手很好玩。。。。希望制作组平衡做的更好，这游戏越来越好把。

Quite honestly, I love this game. Not only has it occupied a lot of my time, it also helped me discover my favorite youtuber, and helped me reach a new level of boosted.
Now, to the actual review.
This game is definitely not for the faint of heart, and I don't mean that for its horror aspects (They wear off after about 30 hours ish of game play) 
The true thing you need to be worried about are the players. While most players are pretty chill and come to have fun, there are a group of people who feel that they deserve to win, and become very toxic when they don't. But enough about them.
Dead by daylight is a 4 v 1 game with 4 survivors, who have to complete objectives, help each other, and work as a team to escape. The 1 stands for the killer, whose sole job is to keep the survivors from escaping by hooking them on, what I can only discribe as very unsanitory, meat hooks. 
There are a variety of perks and items that will make surviving/killing survivors easier. 
One thing I really love and hate about this game is its fanbase. The fanbase is usually great, creating fan art, memes, and more memes, but remember the groups I mentioned above? Yea, they also exist there.

So, in conclusion, buy this game. It's very worth.
10/10

Except that the idea of the game is awesome, everything else is pretty bad. The game should be named "Dead by DLC", since everything is released as DLC and you can't even try the killers / survivors in private matches to check what they can do. Competition is complete nonsense by this fact.

Instead of developing new DLCs just... always... a new game mode would have been pretty awesome. I game the game several tries with friends and its always frustrating that the killers are OP or we do not even know what they are able to do.

Aso ich Grüsse euch alle, Wen du hasst dein Chief auf dein Job, Wen du hasst jemand, oder noch orgen was so enlich  dan bist du genau richtig hier du bist auf richtigste weg Regeln in Dead by daylight  ist 
 so einfach wie dein gurke in dein Jeans. 1 killer 4 surviver Wen du als Killer spielst dein Job ist die 4 surviver töten Wen du spielst als surviver dein Job ist 4 Generator zu repariren. Wenn Sie denken das ist alles ich sage nein  es gibt in den moment 18 killer und 20 surviver Derzeit gibt es 3 Währungen Blutpunkte 
Dies ist die Währung, die Sie in jedem Spiel erhalten, je besser gespielt, desto mehr erhalten sie. Aurazellen diese Währung ist exklusiv für skin Wenn Sie diese Währung erhalten möchten, müssen Sie eine Portmonnee öffnen. Schillernde scherben Sie können diese Währung für jede neue level Ihres account erhalten und mit dem Schillernde scherben könen sie neue skill kaufen. 
Das Spiel wird oft aktualisiert. 
Kleines Entwicklungsteam mini team viele Bugs, aber Sie werden sie nicht immer sehen, Sie können alles verzeihen, weil ein kleines Entwicklungsteam Dynamisches Gameplay, 
Geiler Arsch Meg Thomas Schon kann man kaufen das Spiel wegen dem Arsch von Meg Thomas kaufen :D Entschuldigung Joanna, wenn du es liest xD.... Dieses Spiel hat Nachteile. 
Lange Spielsuche  schlechte Grafik zu wenig donat Der Support reagiert nicht schnell zu Wenig Inhalt für Top-Spieler Ich bin nicht gegen Skins, aber es scheint mir, dass Entwickler nicht ein richtige weg 
Dieses Spiel ist im Moment das einzige in diesem Genre und deshalb werde ich es spielen.Ich liebe dieses Spiel Ich mag es, ich schließe mein auge  aus, wenn es Probleme in diesem Spiel gibt, aber ich denke, jetzt ist die Zeit, es für dich zu kaufen
Warum hast du es nicht gekauft? Nimm die Portmonnee und los gehts  vorwärts!


P ssss Ich gebe 2 Schlüssel für dieses Spiel, wenn Sie mir in einem privaten Chat schreiben Viel glück ^_^

Edit: Patch 4.5 brings a new low for the game with massive animation and UI downgrades. Dropping the game until they fix this unplayable garbage. We need a competitor so bad.

Edit: Game is on patch 4.1, somehow have made it worse.... Loved this game when it was less bullshit...

Edit: As of patch 2.1, they've introduced a whole host of game-breaking issues along with radical balance changes that make this game very dangerous to new players. Good luck if you decide to buy...

Pros:
-Great game to play with your friends.
-Competitive af.
-Solid progression system.
-Game is still receiving significant updates and DLC.

Cons:
-Balance is really bad, on both sides, devs remain clueless about the majority of balance issues and instead fiddle constantly with things that aren't broken.
-As a survivor it's not uncommon to get camped by the killer, which basically ruins the match for you.
-As a killer, it's quite common to get pallet looped, which is utterly frustrating.
-Disconnects mid-game happen too often, as the game can very often be far more frustrating than rewarding.
-There are a number of people who play solely to troll the killer and waste their time. Most killers don't have good counters to trolling techniques in this game.
-Overly frustrating matches are guaranteed on both sides.
-Community can be quite toxic.
